spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout distortions detected. The entire top wing (Bed 3, Bed 4, Bath) has been compressed or merged incorrectly. Bed 2 is significantly oversized compared to the plan. Door placements are largely hallucinated or missing standard hinged representations.

structural_fidelity.notes: Failed strict UI constraint: 'RECESS' text label is visible in the bathroom area. The 'Alfresco' area is missing the outer structural columns and defined boundary. The laundry/WIL/WC zone is structurally reinterpreted into a single open-plan bathroom space.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living room and Theatre furniture approximate the plan, but the kitchen island is missing, and study furniture is incorrectly oriented. Car placement in garage is accurate.

aesthetic_quality.notes: General low-poly style and isometric camera are correct. However, lighting is slightly more dramatic than 'flat shading' requires, and the text overlay significantly penalizes this section under strict adherence.

detected_errors.description: Text label 'RECESS' present on the model floor.
Missing Bed 3 and Bed 4 individual room partitions and the Kitchen island/breakfast bar.
Layout distortion: The Alfresco area and Dining area are merged and lack proper wall boundaries.
Hallucinated shelving and decorative objects in the master suite area not present in 2D plan.
